title: Pooh Bear's big surprise
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
Walt Disney Television Animation, production company
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "The New adventures of Winnie the Pooh". Four more delightful animated stories based on the "Winnie the Pooh" books by A. A. Milne. "My hero". Piglet saves Tigger's life so Tigger is eternally grateful, but in trying too hard to thank his hero, Tigger does more harm than good! "The Rats who came to dinner" Who would have thought that when the Hundred Acre Wood was flooding it would be the sneaky pack-rats who came to the rescue? "Owl feathers" Crisis! Owl is losing his feathers and cannot fly. What can his friends do to help? "King of the beasties" After rescuing his friends from the terrifying "Jagular", Tigger declares himself King of the Beasties.
related_objects: Series; S01086; The New adventures of Winnie the Pooh; Active; 1989
